item.title: Expose Offline LLM via RESTful API
item.description:
Want to make your own offline Large Language Model (LLM) available through an API endpoint? In this video, I‚Äôll walk you step-by-step through creating an ASP.NET Core Web API that serves responses from your locally hosted LLM‚Äîno cloud required.
You‚Äôll learn:
How to integrate an offline LLM (GGUF format) into your ASP.NET Core project How to design an API endpoint to interact with your model How to build a client that sends prompts and streams responses
This approach gives you: ‚úÖ Full data privacy ‚Äì nothing leaves your server ‚úÖ Cost control ‚Äì no monthly API bills ‚úÖ Freedom & flexibility ‚Äì choose and switch models anytime
Whether you‚Äôre building a personal AI assistant, integrating into internal tools, or creating a secure enterprise AI service, this tutorial will help you take control of your AI infrastructure.
üìÇ Source code here: https://github.com/hassanhabib/LLM.Offline.API.Streaming
#OfflineLLM #ASPNETCore #LocalAI #SelfHostedAI #DotNet #GGUF #LlamaCpp
item.author: (Hassan Habib)

item.title: Offline LLM + MCP: Smart Tool Calling in Action
item.description:
Learn how to combine an offline LLM with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to build an AI that can discover tools dynamically and call the right one.
In this demo, I use Mistral 7B Instruct (GGUF) running locally to: Read the MCP function catalog in real time Choose the correct tool based on a user request Execute it‚Äîall offline
Perfect for: Privacy-first AI development Local & offline LLM setups Smart function calling without cloud dependencies
Here's the source code: https://github.com/hassanhabib/SimpleMcp.Demo
Tech stack: C# (.NET 9), Mistral 7B Instruct Q8_0, MCP, offline LLM.
item.author: (Hassan Habib)

item.title: Blueberry Hill
item.description:
ChatGPT 5 was released today.
ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has unveiled the long-awaited latest version of its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, GPT-5, saying it can provide PhD-level expertise. Billed as ‚Äúsmarter, faster, and more useful,‚Äù OpenAI co-founder and chief executive Sam Altman lauded the company‚Äôs new model as ushering in a new era of ChatGPT. ‚ÄúI think having something like GPT-5 would be pretty much unimaginable at any previous time in human history,‚Äù he said ahead of Thursday‚Äôs launch. GPT-5‚Äôs release and claims of its ‚ÄúPhD-level‚Äù abilities in areas such as coding and writing come as tech firms continue to compete to have the most advanced AI chatbot.

item.title: Stop Using MVVM - Nick's .NET Travels
item.description: The Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) pattern has long been a cornerstone in building maintainable and testable UIs across frameworks like WPF, Xamarin, Uno Platform, and others. It provides a clean separation of concerns and enables powerful data binding. But despite its popularity and maturity, MVVM often introduces unnecessary complexity and friction‚Äîparticularly when it comes to state management ... Read more
